title: Metal–insulator–semiconductor photoelectrodes for enhanced photoelectrochemical water splitting
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,6860-6916
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00820G, Review Article
Shice Wei, Xuewen Xia, Shuai Bi, Shen Hu, Xuefeng Wu, Hsien-Yi Hsu, Xingli Zou, Kai Huang, David W. Zhang, Qinqqing Sun, Allen J. Bard, Edward T. Yu, Li Ji
Metal–insulator–semiconductor/MIS-based photoelectrochemical (PEC) water splitting provides a scalable and integrated platform to harness renewable solar energy for green hydrogen production.
